entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.4.12
entry.content: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/533 - resolved - Huntarr seems to skip some missing items when certain Additional Options are set (on Radarr)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.4.13
entry.content:
Resolved - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/234 - Season [Packs] Mode + Skip Future Releases Bug

The process_missing_seasons_packs_mode function in src/primary/apps/sonarr/missing.py was completely missing the future episode filtering logic: Missing parameter: The function didn't have skip_future_episodes in its signature Missing call parameter: The function call didn't pass skip_future_episodes Missing filtering logic: No future episode filtering was implemented
